Package com.netgrif.application.engine.petrinet.domain.arcs

package com.netgrif.application.engine.petrinet.domain.arcs
  • Related Packages

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Arc
     
    ArcOrderComparator
     
    InhibitorArc
    If there is an arc a with a weight w=W(p,t) connecting a place p with a transition t, then t can be enabled in a marking m if the following condition is satisfied:
    m(p) < w
    More info
    PTArc
    Special arcs that can only lead from Place to Transition (thus PT).
    QArc
    QArc is a Querydsl query type for Arc
    QInhibitorArc
    QInhibitorArc is a Querydsl query type for InhibitorArc
    QPTArc
    QPTArc is a Querydsl query type for PTArc
    QReadArc
    QReadArc is a Querydsl query type for ReadArc
    QResetArc
    QResetArc is a Querydsl query type for ResetArc
    ReadArc
    If there is an arc a with a weight w=W(p,t) connecting a place p with a transition t, then t can be enabled in a marking m if the following condition is satisfied:
    m(p) ≥ w
    More info
    ResetArc
    Reset arc does not alter the enabling condition, but involve a change of the marking on p by firing of t: m'(p) = 0, if p is not also a postplace of t m'(p) = W(t,p), if p is also a postplace of t More info
